function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Reduced effectiveness of contact tracing due to low smartphone penetration, especially among the elderly.","Impact":"Inadequate contact tracing may result in the increased spread of contagious diseases.","Mitigation":"Provide alternative contact tracing methods for those without smartphones, and prioritize other interventions in areas with low smartphone penetration.","Technologies":"Non-smartphone based contact tracing methods, targeted public health interventions.","People":"Elderly individuals, individuals without smartphones.","Owner":"Public health authorities, community organizations."},{"Description":"Privacy concerns related to the collection and storage of personal information by mobile apps.","Impact":"Loss of privacy and potential misuse of personal data.","Mitigation":"Implement strict privacy regulations, transparent data collection policies, and secure data storage practices.","Technologies":"Privacy-preserving data collection methods, encryption, secure data servers.","People":"Mobile app users, general public.","Owner":"App developers, regulatory authorities."},{"Description":"Dependence on people's willingness to embrace new technology and digital infrastructure for successful implementation of digital communication tracing and tracking.","Impact":"Limited effectiveness of digital technology for communication tracing and tracking in areas with low technology adoption.","Mitigation":"Invest in digital infrastructure, promote digital literacy and education, and provide incentives for technology adoption.","Technologies":"Digital infrastructure, educational technology, incentives for technology adoption.","People":"General public, technology users.","Owner":"Government, technology companies, educational institutions."}]}
